sentence.Network_en: Objective : To assess the value of transrectal TRE in clinical applications.
sentence.Network_cn: 目的: 评价直肠腔内超声在临床中的应用价值.

sentence.Network_en: The drawbacks of traditional TRE methods are also proved in the evaluation work.
sentence.Network_cn: 评价结果还进一步证明了传统的过渡区直接提取与分割算法的不足.

sentence.Network_en: Objective : To observe the effect of ozone water and baking tre at colpitis mycotic separately.
sentence.Network_cn: 观察臭氧水和碳酸氢钠分别用于治疗霉菌性阴道炎的疗效.

auth_sentence.content: The word is pronounced me-ter, not me-tre.
auth_sentence.res_content: The word is pronounced me-ter, not me-tre.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The word is pronounced me-ter, not me-tre.

auth_sentence.content: Lema tre studied at the University of Leuven, the University of Cambridge, Harvard and MIT.
auth_sentence.res_content: Lema tre studied at the University of Leuven, the University of Cambridge, Harvard and MIT.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Lema tre studied at the University of Leuven, the University of Cambridge, Harvard and MIT.

baesInfo.ciba_translate_msg: 以上结果来自机器翻译。
baesInfo.translate_msg: 以上结果来自百度翻译。
